name: tonys-cool-docco-theme
description: Docco layout and css, etc for use with docco generated documentation

scripts.build: lessc src/styles/docco.less | cat - node_modules/highlight.js/styles/github.css > dist/docco.css && cp src/docco.jst dist/
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test && npm run serve

author: Tony Boyles <aaboyles@gmail.com>
